archimate:Requirement.name: UN_FA_2
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a forecasting duty officer I need the system to provide an interactive map-based graphical user interface (e.g. point and click, multiple play back of sequential time series, zoom, pan, thumbnail) and create time series hydrographs and user defined files/documents to export to other interfaces/systems/platforms so that I can use and share the information used in forecasting models (e.g. catchment average/max) and other areas of work.
